message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Accept and we can move on.
I'll give you a slightly better offer. It's still not bad for me, but I'm willing to compromise.
I'm willing to take a slightly larger share, but I still think this is a fair compromise. Don't make me wait too long, Bob!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away too much. You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve a bigger share.
I'm getting impatient, Bob. I think this is my best offer so far. Take it or leave it!
I'm not going to give in to your demands, Alice. I'll give you a slightly better offer, but don't think this is the end of the game.
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing. I'm not getting any younger!
You're really trying to squeeze me out, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give up yet.
This is my last offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing. I'm not going to get any more generous than this!
You're really trying to starve me out, aren't you? I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm not going to give up yet.
This is my absolute final offer, Bob. Take it, or we'll both walk away with nothing. I'm not bluffing this time!
I've had enough of your games, Alice. I'm giving up. You can have it all.
